snippet: Despite threats to leave, the United States and NATO may still prefer to keep a residual force.
abstract: Editorial argues Pres Obama's threat to withdraw all troops from Afghanistan, aimed at forcing Pres Hamid Karzai to sign a security agreement, may be damaging United States interests in region; holds despite the desire to be done with war, it seems necessary to leave a small US force in Afghanistan for the foreseeable future, both to shore up country's security forces and to discourage terrorism.
lead_paragraph: Despite threats to leave, the United States and NATO may still prefer to keep a residual force.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
